alert.note: Alert for McKenzie; Williams (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 02 at 9:37AM CDT until July 03 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Missouri River near Williston affecting McKenzie and Williams Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Missouri River near Williston. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, low-lying farmland and access roads to oil well sites near Trenton are flooded. City of Williston does not flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Sunday /7:00 AM MDT Sunday/ the stage was 22.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
